articles.title: Zombie Angelina Jolie, 19, Sentenced To A Decade In Iranian Prison For Instagram Post - Talent Recap
articles.description: World News | Instagram influencer Sahar Tabar has been sentenced to 10 years in Iranian prison. Her make-up and Photoshop tricks got her more than fame.
articles.content: Sahar Tabar, the influencer you may know as “Zombie Angelina Jolie,” will be seeing Iranian prison bars for the next ten years. After being arrested last year for her activities on social media, the … [+2881 chars]
